name: Tundo Bundo
description:
A very brief experiment in recreating gameplay from Super Mario Brothers 2 and Super Mario World.

Picking up and throwing some special veggies will create a door to the mirror level. Find the exit from the level by navigating through these doors.

(Note: player death, from enemies or falling in pits has been disabled. Have fun!)

Controls:

  • Left, Right Arrows, D-Pad: Move
  • Down Arrow, D-Pad: Pickup veggies and enemies
  • Up Arrow, D-Pad: Enter doors
  • Z, Button 1: Hold to run, press to throw a held veggie or enemy
  • X, Button 2: Press to jump
